about.summary: Highly configurable 2D (SVG) & 3D (threejs) visualisations for ASE/Pymatgen structures, within the Jupyter Notebook

name: ase-notebook
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "ase-notebook" %}
{% set version = "0.3.1" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: "https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  sha256: 9be0e78d4ffebdf9eda881664187154f2439942131dfd40157e1cad36e606cbb

build:
  number: 0
  entry_points:
    - ase-notebook.view_atoms = ase_notebook.viewer:launch_gui_exec
  noarch: "python"
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv "

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=3.5
    - setuptools
  run:
    - ase >=3.18,<4
    - attrs >=19,<20
    - importlib_resources >=1,<2
    - ipywidgets >=7.5,<8
    - matplotlib >=3.1,<4
    - numpy >=1.16
    - python >=3.5
    - pythreejs >=2.1,<3
    - svgutils >=0.3,<0.4
    - svgwrite >=1.3,<2

test:
  imports:
    - ase_notebook
    - ase_notebook.backend
    - ase_notebook.data

about:
  home: "https://github.com/chrisjsewell/ase-notebook"
  license: "MIT"
  license_family: "MIT"
  license_file: "LICENSE"
  summary: "Highly configurable 2D (SVG) & 3D (threejs) visualisations for ASE/Pymatgen structures, within the Jupyter Notebook"
  doc_url: "https://ase-notebook.readthedocs.io/"

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - chrisjsewell
